segments.text: The poor girl is up to the eyes in study all the day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , she has a lot of homework .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Today's children have not the chance to play , to make fun of them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . So in some way we are happier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , at least when we are children , we have not so much homework to do .
segments.speaker: S1
